name: Police Chase (itch) (thingspool)
description:
Police Chase is a turn-based action game. You, as a professional thief, is being pursued by cops in your red sports car.

Your job is to gather as many hidden treasures as possible while also trying to escape from the grasp of police cars. 

Use arrow keys (either on-screen or on your keyboard) to move, and use various items that you've gathered throughout the game to get yourself out of trouble (number keys can be used as a shortcut for item selection).

Good luck!
